title: Smart Data Models - ExcELIN2
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Detailed Excitation System Model - ELIN (VATECH).  This model represents an all-static excitation system. A PI voltage controller establishes a desired field current set point for a proportional current controller. The integrator of the PI controller has a follow-up input to match its signal to the present field current.  Power system stabilizer models used in conjunction with this excitation system model: PssELIN2, PssIEEE2B, Pss2B.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcELIN2

efdbas.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (Efdbas).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

iefmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter (Iefmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

iefmax2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum open circuit excitation voltage (Iefmax2).  Typical Value = -5. Default: 0.0

iefmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter (Iefmin).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator input gain (K1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k1ec.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator input limit (K1ec).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

k2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (K2).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

k3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (K3).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

k4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (K4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kd1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage controller derivative gain (Kd1).  Typical Value = 34.5. Default: 0.0

ke2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (Ke2).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ketb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (Ketb).  Typical Value = 0.06. Default: 0.0

pid1max.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller follow up gain (PID1max).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

seve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve1, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve1]).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

seve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve2, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve2]).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

tb1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage controller derivative washout time constant (Tb1).  Typical Value = 12.45. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Te).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time Constant (Te2).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

ti1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller follow up dead band (Ti1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ti3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Ti3).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

ti4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Ti4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tr4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Tr4).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

upmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter (Upmax).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

upmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limiter (Upmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve1).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

ve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

xp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation transformer effective reactance (Xp).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0
